hero.headline: Focus on What Matters. We've Got the Foundation Covered.
hero.description: Streamline your processes with a boilerplate built for efficiency and optimal productivity.

howItWorks.howItWorksTitleHighlight: Experience the benefits of using our product with every step.
howItWorks.howItWorksDescription: We designed our product to simplify your life. It offers a comprehensive solution. Here's how it works and how it benefits you at each stage.
howItWorks.prebuiltDescription: Leverage pre-built sections like "Features," "Benefits," "Pricing," and "Testimonials" to showcase your product effectively.
howItWorks.scalableDescription: Our boilerplate is designed to grow with your product. Easily add new features and functionalities as needed.
howItWorks.easyDescription: Tailor the experience to your specific needs and preferences for maximum results.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it - see what actual users of our product have to say about their experience.
testimonials.content: I've been using this web hosting service for over a year and I'm really impressed with the uptime and support. The website has never gone down and the customer service is always quick to help with any issues I have. Highly recommend!

perfectFit.title: Find The Perfect Fit
perfectFit.description: Choose the boilerplate plan that best suits your project needs and budget. All plans include access to our comprehensive library of pre-built sections, drag-and-drop customization.
